This website is dedicated to my ongoing master thesis project on the topic
of externalizing phenotypes, more specifically I research externalizing outcomes
in children vs adults, namely in children with conduct disorder and adults with 
antosocial personality disorder and/or psychopathy.
Feel free to
- check out the about me page
- and dive deeper into my topic
